name: Free Piano for kids and babies
name_original: Free Piano for kids and babies
description:
Kids piano synth - is a fun game with the voices of animals and the sounds of musical instruments, which will help your baby make its first steps in the world of music.
By pressing the key, your baby can play funny sounds in a different tone and consistency. Play the drum part or arrange caterwaul - it's so easy!

The game has different modes, each of which offers its own set of sounds and characters for keys.

In "Animal Sounds" your baby can choose the little animal, and play the melody with its voice by pressing the keys.

In "The Sound of musical instruments" child will be able to create melodies with simple musical instrument sounds.
